short_summary: Purchase of Dell Isilon Hardware and Software maintenance and support
description: This solicitation is for the purchase of Dell Isilon Hardware and Software or equivalent Maintenance and Support or equivalent for Department of National Defence
full_summary:
**Tender Notice: Dell Isilon Hardware and Software Maintenance and Support**

**English Title**: Invitation to Tender for Dell Isilon or Equivalent Hardware and Software Maintenance and Support for the Department of National Defence
**French Title**: Invitation à la procédure de sélection pour la maintenance et le soutien du système de stockage Dell Isilon ou équivalent pour le ministère de la Défense nationale

**Reference Number**: SSC-24-00027628:T
**Publication Date**: September 24, 2024
**Closing Date**: October 10, 2024, at 14:00 EST

**Notice Description:**
The Department of National Defence (DND) invites contractors to submit their bids for the provision of Dell Isilon hardware and software maintenance and support services. The selected contractor will be responsible for the upkeep and repair of the DND's Isilon storage systems, ensuring optimal performance and data integrity.

**Geographic Location**: This tender is open to purchasers from Ontario, with delivery expected to take place within the province.

**Trade Agreements**: This tender process is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.

**G.S.I.N. Code:**
* 7030A - Computer software, office automation, document management, mail, networks, publishing, spreadsheets, typesetting, word processing (microcomputers only)

**Solicitation and Bidding Process:**
Bidders can register on the Shared Services Canada (SSC) P2P portal to access the solicitation, submit their bid, and receive updates. To register, please visit the SSC portal website at [supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca](http://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca).

**Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada (SSC)
Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario K0A 0C3, Canada
Phone: (343) 576-9329
Fax: (343) 576-9329

The rewritten entry addresses all the key points clearly and professionally, making it suitable for a government tender announcement. It includes the necessary technical details, geographic locations, trade agreements, and registration requirements for bidders. The language used is formal and concise. - please let me know if there's something I can improve.
